word: Self-respect Must Be Firmly Cherished.--Moral purity, self-respect, a strong power of resistance, must be firmly and constantly cherished. There should not be one departure from reserve. One act of familiarity, one indiscretion, may jeopardize the soul by opening the door to temptation and thus weakening the power of resistance. --HPMMW 26, 1885. (CH 295.)
